title: The anatomie of sorcerie VVherein the wicked impietie of charmers, inchanters, and such like, is discouered and confuted. By Iames Mason, Master of Artes.
author: Mason, James, M.A.
publisher: By Iohn Legatte, printer to the Vniuersitie of Cambridge. 1612. And are to be sold in Pauls Church-yard at the signe of the Crowne by Simon Waterson,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
